Name: Stanley
Natural: The Stanley 100’ Laser Distance Measurer provides accurate readings within ±2 mm and supports continuous measurement plus add/subtract functions. It’s ideal for solo measuring tasks in construction or interior planning.

Name: Fluke
Natural: The Fluke 417D Laser Distance Meter measures up to 131 ft with ±2 mm accuracy, featuring a bright LCD, continuous measurement, and IP54-rated durability. Ideal for both indoor and outdoor use with one-handed operation and 3-year warranty.

Name: Makita
Natural: The Makita LD080P measures up to 262 ft with ±1/16" precision and supports 9 functions including Pythagoras and volume. With 20-history memory, tripod mount, and IP54 rating, it’s perfect for pros needing versatile laser measurement.

Name: Leica
Natural: The Leica DISTO D1 is a compact Bluetooth laser measurer with a 40m range, ideal for quick interior measurements. It syncs to the DISTO Sketch App for digital plans and offers seamless data transfer from site to office.

Name: Hilti
Natural: The Hilti laser distance measurer ranges to 328 ft with ±1.5 mm accuracy, Bluetooth, and smart functions like stake-out and volume calculation. Its rugged build and ergonomic design make it ideal for professional indoor use.

Name: DeWalt
Natural: The DeWalt 12V MAX 3x360 Green Laser features IP65 water/debris resistance, pulse mode, and overmolded housing. It’s perfect for layout, framing, and drywall with a rechargeable battery and extended bracket for ceiling installs.

Name: Bosch
Natural: The Bosch GLM 50 C Laser Measure offers 165 ft range with ±1/16" accuracy, Bluetooth, inclinometer, and color display. Compact and app-connected, it’s ideal for pros needing real-time measurement, angles, and digital floor plans.

Name: Spectra Precision
Natural: The Spectra LT58G laser tool projects 3x 360° green beams with up to 25-hour battery life, auto self-leveling, and ceiling-mount accessories. Built tough for jobsite use, it’s ideal for high-precision interior layout work.
